fun numSquares(n: Int): Int {
    var i = 0
    var j = n + 1
    val squares = IntArray(n + 1)
    while (i < j) {
        val k = i * i
        squares[i] = 2147483647
        i++
        if (k >= j) continue
        val l = i + 1
        squares[l] = 2147483647
        i = l
    }
    var result = 0
    var m = 0
    while (m < n) {
        val n = m * m
        if (n > j) break
        if (n == j) {
            result = 1
            break
        }
        val o = m + 1
        squares[o] = 2147483647
        m = o
    }
    return squares[0]
}

package com.example

import kotlin.jvm.internal.Intrinsics

public final class KtKt {
    public static final void quickSort(int[] arr, int start, int end) {
        Intrinsics.checkNotNullParameter(arr, "arr")
        if (start >= end) return
        val pivot = partition(arr, start, end)
        quickSort(arr, start, pivot - 1)
        quickSort(arr, pivot + 1, end)
    }

    public static final int partition(int[] arr, int start, int end) {
        Intrinsics.checkNotNullParameter(arr, "arr")
        val pivot = arr[start]
        var left = start + 1
        var right = end
        while (true) {
            while (left <= right && arr[left] <= pivot) left++
            while (right >= left && arr[right] > pivot) right--
            if (left >= right) break
            val tmp = arr[left]
            arr[left] = arr[right]
            arr[right] = tmp
        }
        arr[start] = arr[right]
        arr[right] = pivot
        return right
    }
}

package com.radix2.algorithms.week1

class UnionFindKt {
    fun main(args: Array<String>) {

        uf.union(4, 3)

        uf.union(2, 1)
        uf.union(5, 0)
        uf.union(7, 2)
        uf.union(6, 1)
        uf.union(7, 3)
    }
}

package com.example.floydwarshall

import com.example.floydwarshall.FloydWarshall

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    val matrix = Array(5) { IntArray(5) }
    matrix[0][0] = 0
    matrix[0][1] = 3
    matrix[0][2] = -2
    matrix[0][3] = 1
    matrix[0][4] = 2
    matrix[1][0] = 1
    matrix[1][1] = 3
    matrix[1][2] = 2
    matrix[1][3] = 4
    matrix[1][4] = 3
    matrix[2][0] = -2
    matrix[2][1] = 2
    matrix[2][2] = 3
    matrix[2][3] = 4
    matrix[2][4] = 3
    matrix[3][0] = 1
    matrix[3][1] = 4
    matrix[3][2] = 3
    matrix[3][3] = 2
    matrix[3][4] = 1
    matrix[4][0] = 2
    matrix[4][1] = 3
    matrix[4][2] = 4
    matrix[4][3] = 3
    matrix[4][4] = 2
    FloydWarshall.INSTANCE.doCalcs(matrix)
}
